## Summary

Describe the problem and the solution in a few sentences.

## Changes

- Bullet the key code or UI changes
- Note any breaking changes or migrations

## Screenshots (UI)

Add before/after screenshots or a short clip when UI changes are visible.

## Checklist

- [ ] Title follows Conventional Commits (e.g., `feat:`, `fix:`, `refactor:`, `docs:`, `ci:`)
- [ ] `go build ./...` and `go test ./...` pass locally
- [ ] `make lint` passes (CSS heuristics)
- [ ] Docs updated (README/help text) where appropriate

## Labels

Apply `type/*` (bug, feature, docs, ci) and `area/*` (ui, templates, backend, steam) labels as appropriate. The labeler workflow auto-applies many labels based on paths.
